#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

typedef long double ld;

int n;

int main(){
  cout.precision(10);
  cout.setf(ios::fixed);
  int t; cin >> t;
  for(int cass = 0; cass < t; ++cass){
    cin >> n;
    cout << 100.0*pow(1./(ld(n+1)),1./(ld(n))) << '\n';
  }
}
